メソッドの詳細

act

public void act()
Act - do whatever the GolfBall wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.

オーバーライド:
クラス greenfoot.Actor 内の act

getBallImage

public greenfoot.GreenfootImage getBallImage()
getBallImage - gets image of a black circle filled with white.

戻り値:
a new golf ball image. YOU WILL LIKELY WANT TO CALL THIS METHOD FROM YOUR CONSTRUCTOR AND POSSIBLY ELSEWHERE, ALTHOUGH YOU ARE ***NOT*** REQUIRED TO DO SO

getRightArrowImage

public greenfoot.GreenfootImage getRightArrowImage(greenfoot.Color col)
getRightArrowImage - gets image of an arrow pointing to the right

パラメータ:
col - - the color to draw the arrow with.
戻り値:
a new right arrow image. YOU WILL LIKELY WANT TO CALL THIS METHOD FROM YOUR ACT METHOD AND POSSIBLY ELSEWHERE, ALTHOUGH YOU ARE ***NOT*** REQUIRED TO DO SO
